synopsis.text: Will ing to pay tribute to his late mentor, Ryu finds himself haunted by the memories of his master's demise. As he embarks on a journey to perfect his martial arts prowess and free himself from the clutches of the Dark Hadou, Ryu must face his greatest adversary yet - the menacing Gouki. Meanwhile, a dark cloud looms over Ryu and Ken's reunion as they confront a battle unlike any other. Struggling against the evil forces consuming him, Ryu discovers his long-lost brother, Shun, is alive but held captive by the sinister Shadowlaw organization. In order to save Shun and control the powers threatening him, Ryu must embark on a journey of self-discovery. But as his confidence wanes, will he have the strength to defeat Gouki, the ruthless master of the dark "Hadou"?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
